column1: Smoque BBQ////Haven't had their fries or ribs
column2: but... some tasty items on this menu. The pulled pork and cornbread are pretty good
column3: the mac and cheese is really great
column5: sliced is always better and more tender in my book) brisket is YUMMY. Most places do not do brisket well
column7: these guys have a handle on it. It's truly a disappointment ordering brisket at most BBQ joints after having had it at Smoque. Not kidding. Nice staff
